info.description:
=============================================
Account Mass Reconcile by Manufacturing Order
=============================================

.. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
   !! This file is generated by oca-gen-addon-readme !!
   !! changes will be overwritten.                   !!
   !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

    :target: https://odoo-community.org/page/development-status
    :alt: Beta
.. |badge2| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/licence-AGPL--3-blue.png
    :target: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0-standalone.html
    :alt: License: AGPL-3
.. |badge3| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/github-OCA%2Faccount--reconcile-lightgray.png?logo=github
    :target: https://github.com/OCA/account-reconcile/tree/14.0/account_mass_reconcile_by_mrp_production
    :alt: OCA/account-reconcile
.. |badge4| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/weblate-Translate%20me-F47D42.png
    :target: https://translation.odoo-community.org/projects/account-reconcile-14-0/account-reconcile-14-0-account_mass_reconcile_by_mrp_production
    :alt: Translate me on Weblate
.. |badge5| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/runbot-Try%20me-875A7B.png

|badge1| |badge2| |badge3| |badge4| |badge5| 

This module extends the functionality of account_mass_reconcile and
allow an user to reconcile debits and credits of an Account
using the MO line.

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Usage
=====

To use this module, you need to:

* Go to 'Accounting / Adviser / Mass Automatic Reconcile'.

* Create a new reconciliation profile, and select a new configuration entry
  with type 'Advanced. Mrp production.'.

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/account-reconcile/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/account-reconcile/issues/new?body=module:%20account_mass_reconcile_by_mrp_production%0Aversion:%2014.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.
